REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0162 reute u f BC-HYDRO-QUEBEC-CANADIAN 03-12 0040

TEXT.TITLE: HYDRO QUEBEC CANADIAN DLR BOND RAISED TO 150 MLN
TEXT.BODY: The Canadian dollar bond launched earlier today for Hydro Quebec has been increased to 150 mln dlrs from 125 mln, lead manager Merrill Lynch International said. REUTER
